data.title: Where is Newcastle upon Tyne? Newcastle upon Tyne on a map
data.text:
Where is Newcastle upon Tyne?

Newcastle upon Tyne is located in the county of Tyne & Wear, North East England, one mile north of the town of Gateshead, 92 miles south-east of Edinburgh, and 247 miles north of London. Newcastle upon Tyne lies five miles north of the Durham border, and was historically in the county of Northumberland. Newcastle upon Tyne falls within the metropolitan district council of Newcastle upon Tyne. It is in the NE1 postcode district. The post town for Newcastle upon Tyne is Newcastle upon Tyne.

Newcastle upon Tyne on a map

Bounding box showing extent of Newcastle upon Tyne

Location of Newcastle upon Tyne within the UK

Which county is Newcastle upon Tyne in?

Newcastle upon Tyne is in the ceremonial county of Tyne & Wear, and the historic county of Northumberland.

Ceremonial CountyTyne & WearHistoric CountyNorthumberland

Where is Newcastle upon Tyne in Tyne & Wear?

Newcastle upon Tyne is situated roughly centrally between the southernmost and northernmost extremities of Tyne & Wear, and roughly centrally between the easternmost and westernmost extremities of Tyne & Wear.

Location of Newcastle upon Tyne within Tyne & Wear

What is the postcode for Newcastle upon Tyne?

The nearest postcode to the centre of Newcastle upon Tyne is NE1 7PQ.

Where is Newcastle upon Tyne in NE1?

Newcastle upon Tyne is situated towards the northernmost extremity of the NE1 postcode district, and roughly centrally between the easternmost and westernmost extremities of the NE1 postcode district.

Location of Newcastle upon Tyne within NE1

What is the post town for Newcastle upon Tyne?

The post town for Newcastle upon Tyne is Newcastle upon Tyne. Newcastle upon Tyne is in the NE1 postcode district, which corresponds to the post town of Newcastle upon Tyne.

What is the latitude and longitude of Newcastle upon Tyne?

The centre of Newcastle upon Tyne is located at position 54.97801째 latitude and -1.61019째 longitude.

Latitude54.97801째Longitude-1.61019째

What is the easting and northing of Newcastle upon Tyne?

The centre of Newcastle upon Tyne is located at the grid reference easting 425048 and northing 564892 within the British National Grid (OSGB36) system.

Easting425048Northing564892
